histogram.name: Shortcuts.Icons.StorageCount
histogram.summary: This is a record of the number of files in the directory used to store icons for the web "shortcut" feature. This is recorded when the user creates a shortcut using the 3-dot-menu -> "Save and Share" -> "Create Shortcut" functionality. If this metric shows that users have a large number of files here, then a new design or some other mitigation may be required. This requires the kShortcutsNotApps feature to be enabled.
